36156.「こっ…この温もりは まさかっ！？\n<br>\n「……いや そんなバカな。\n:
Thi-this warmth, no way!?
...No, that's impossible. There shouldn't be anything but monsters living in the Hades' Heart...

36155.「……ブルブルブル。\n 私たちは この冥王の心臓に囚われた\n あわれな死者の:
...*trembling* We pitiful souls of the dead captured in the Hades' Heart are mere shadows of our former selves...
We are fated to be wholly consumed by the Netherlord Nergel and disappear. *trembling*

36157.「おそろしい おそろしい。\n 冥王ネルゲルが持つ 絶望の鎌が\n おそろしい…:
Terrifying, terrifying. The Scythe of Despair that Netherlord Nergel possesses is terrifying...
It reaps the souls of the dead, transforms them into dark magic, and devours them; that scythe is terrifying.

36154.「この らせん階段を上った先……\n かなり気になる宝箱が あるんだけど\n 身:
At the top of this spiral staircase... There is a
rather interesting treasure chest, but with me not
having a body, I can't open it.

36153.「にくい にくい にくい……。\n<br>\n「オレを殺した 魔物が にくい。\:
Hateful, hateful, hateful...
That monster that murdered me is hateful. That Nergel who trapped me is hateful.
I'm dead, and yet, I still exist; all those guys are hateful!!

36158.フィーフィの破邪舟が 停まっている。\n<br>\n破邪舟に乗って ランドン山脈:
Fifi's Sacred Ship is parked. Would you like
to take the Sacred Ship back to Landon
Mountains?<yesno><close>

36159.「にくい にくい にくい……。\n<br>\n「ネルゲルが 死のうとも 我が恨み:
I am bitter, I am bitter, I am bitter. Even if Nergel dies, my resentment will not disappear. I am distressed, and everything is
distressing.

36160.「……ううううう。 \n だんだん 自分が どこの誰だったのか\n 思いだせなく:
Ughhhh. Gradually, I can no longer remember who I was or where I was. When all memories are gone, will the existence of me disappear
completely from this world?

36161.「……ブルブルブル。\n 冥王ネルゲルが 滅ぼされ\n ヤツに 喰われる心配は:
...*trembling* Netherlord Nergel has been destroyed and we no longer have to worry about being eaten by him.
How long until we be free from this place? *trembling*...

36162.「冥王ネルゲルが 滅んでも\n 世界をおおう 邪悪な気配は\n 消えてはいない…:
Even though Netherlord Nergel has perished, the evil that pervades the world has not disappeared. True evil still hides itself,
waiting with bated breath for the coming of a new age of darkness.

36163.「倒された 倒された！\n 冥王ネルゲルが 倒された！\n<br>\n「エテーネ:
He's down. He's down! Netherlord Nergel has
been defeated! The blood of Ethene has
defeated Nergel!
